con:interface.name: Change Inventory APIs
con:interface.con:description:
# CI-REST-API API documentation for **Change Inventory** related screens provided by CMiC
_Note: These APIs can only be accessed if already a customer of CMiC._

con:part.con:content:
--- openapi: 3.0.0 info: title: Change Inventory APIs description: | # CI-REST-API API documentation for **Change Inventory** related screens provided by CMiC
_Note: These APIs can only be accessed if already a customer of CMiC._ contact: email: roshan.suntharan@cmic.ca version: "1" servers: - url: https://mobtest.cmiccloudr12.com/cmictestrti security: - BasicAuth: [] tags: - name: ciclass description: CI Classes - name: ciinventoryissue description: CI Inventory Issues - name: ciitem description: CI Items - name: ciitemdetail description: CI Item Details - name: ciitemhdr description: CI Item Headers - name: ciitemloclog description: CI Item Location Logs - name: cilocation description: CI Locations - name: citranposted description: CI Posted Transactions paths: /ci-rest-api/rest/1/ciclass: get: tags: - ciclass summary: Retrieve CI Classes description: "" parameters: - name: finder in: query description: selectByDate required: false style: form explode: true schema: type: string - name: AuditDate in: query description: Audit Date (selectByDate) required: false style: form explode: true schema: type: string responses: "200": description: Successful Operation content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/CiClass' "400": description: "An error occurred while attempting to retrieve, create, or delete record(s)" content: application/json: examples: Result: value: "{}" post: tags: - ciclass summary: Create a CI Class description: "" parameters: [] requestBody: $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/CiClassRequest' responses: "201": description: Successful Operation content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/CiClass' "400": description: "An error occurred while attempting to retrieve, create, or delete record(s)" content: application/json: examples: Result: value: "{}" /ci-rest-api/rest/1/ciclass/{Vuuid}: get: tags: - ciclass summary: Retrieve a Specific CI Class description: "" parameters: - name: Vuuid in: path description: Unique Row ID required: true style: simple explode: false schema: type: string responses: "200": description: Successful Operation content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/CiClass' "400": description: "An error occurred while attempting to retrieve, create, or delete record(s)" content: application/json: examples: Result: value: "{}" delete: tags: - ciclass summary: Delete a Specific CI Class description: "" parameters: - name: Vuuid in: path description: Unique Row ID required: true style: simple explode: false schema: type: string responses: "204": description: Object has been successfully deleted. content: application/json: examples: Result: value: "{}" "400": description: "An error occurred while attempting to retrieve, create, or delete record(s)" content: application/json: examples: Result: value: "{}" patch: tags: - ciclass summary: Update a Specific CI Class description: "" parameters: - name: Vuuid in: path description: Unique Row ID required: true style: simple explode: false schema: type: string requestBody: $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/CiClassRequest' responses: "200": description: Successful Operation content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/CiClass' "400": description: "An error occurred while attempting to retrieve, create, or delete record(s)" content: application/json: examples: Result: value: "{}" /ci-rest-api/rest/1/ciinventoryissue: get: tags: - ciinventoryissue summary: Retrieve Inventory Issues description: "" parameters: - name: finder in: query description: CiInventoryIssueFinder required: false style: form explode: true schema: type: string - name: CompCode in: query description: Company Code (CiInventoryIssueFinder) required: false style: form explode: true schema: type: string - name: BchNum in: query description: Batch Number (CiInventoryIssueFinder) required: false style: form explode: true schema: type: string - name: ReqNum in: query description: Requisition Number (CiInventoryIssueFinder) required: false style: form explode: true schema: type: string responses: "200": description: Successful Operation content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/CiInventoryIssue' "400": description: "An error occurred while attempting to retrieve, create, or delete record(s)" content:
